short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pristine Reader is a browser extension that turns web pages into a clean, distraction-free reading experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform any web page into a distraction-free reading experience with Pristine Reader. Designed for Chrome, Brave, Edge, Opera, and Arc browsers, Pristine strips away unnecessary elements, letting you focus on what matters most – the content.

Key Features ✨
• Clean Reading Mode
• Save & Organize
• Offline Access
• Global Search
• Customization
• Text-to-Speech
• Built-in Dictionary & Notes
• Code Highlighting
• PDF Export & Printing
• Data Import/Export

Built with React and Vite, Pristine offers a fast, responsive experience while using chrome.storage for seamless data sync across your devices.

Take control of your web reading experience with Pristine – where clean content meets powerful organization. Install now and make the web more reader-friendly!
